title: Rishi Sunak Has a Boris Johnson Problem
description: Already saddled with a budget crisis amid a cost-of-living crisis, the British prime minister has to deal with his predecessor.
dc:creator: Mark Landler
media:description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak of Britain on Wednesday. It was Mr. Sunak’s resignation as Boris Johnson’s chancellor of the Exchequer that triggered his boss’s downfall.
